messages.content: This tool is a platform used for containerization.
Which tool allows you to define and manage infrastructure as code?
This tool automates the deployment and management of containerized applications.
Which configuration management tool is agentless and uses SSH for communication?
This Microsoft tool provides a suite of development and collaboration services.
Which tool allows you to package applications and their dependencies into a container image?
This container orchestration tool scales and manages containerized workloads.
Which tool uses a declarative approach for infrastructure configuration?
This configuration management tool uses a YAML-based language called Playbooks.
Which Microsoft tool provides version control, build automation, and CI/CD pipelines?
This tool enables you to run applications in isolated containers.
Which container orchestration tool was originally developed by Google?
This tool is a popular choice for managing cloud infrastructure.
Which configuration management tool uses a push-based model?
This Microsoft tool was formerly known as Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS).
Which tool is used for automating the deployment and scaling of containers?
This tool is commonly used for creating and managing infrastructure as code.
Which configuration management tool uses a Master-Slave architecture?
This Microsoft tool integrates with Git repositories for version control.
Which tool allows you to create, deploy, and manage applications within containers?
This container orchestration tool supports self-healing and auto-scaling features.
Which tool uses HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL) for defining infrastructure?
This configuration management tool uses YAML or JSON for writing configuration files.
This Microsoft tool provides built-in test management and reporting capabilities.
Which tool allows you to run applications consistently across different environments?
This container orchestration tool provides horizontal auto-scaling for pods.
Which tool can manage both public cloud providers and on-premises infrastructure?
This configuration management tool can manage Windows, Linux, and network devices.
This Microsoft tool supports automated testing and continuous integration.
Which tool allows you to share and distribute container images?
This container orchestration tool allows you to define and manage multi-container applications.

This configuration management tool uses a declarative language for specifying configurations.
This Microsoft tool provides integrated reporting and dashboards for project tracking.
